nodes.text: Yarith Bespin was the name of a hotel in Cloud City on Bespin. It housed the Pair O'Dice Casino.
The hotel had a series of turbolifts running up and down its sides, expansive windows showing the surrounding cityscape and at least one dining hall.

It was the most high-class hotel in Cloud City, frequented by dignitaries and celebrities. It is possible that it was also the name of a person for whom the Bespin system was named for. Yarith Figg could also be the namesake.
The casino was the location of the Cloud City Sabacc Tournament final that was contested by Lando Calrissian and Han Solo, in which Solo won the Millennium Falcon from Lando.

In 3 ABY, having reached Bespin after the Battle of Hoth, Han Solo, Leia Organa, Chewbacca and C-3PO were given a luxurious apartment suite in this hotel by Lando Calrissian, while they waited for the Millennium Falcon to be repaired.
The Verpine Vaxan worked in the casino and when he failed to turn up to work one day, the casino's droid dealers became worried about him.

In Galaxy Guide 2: Yavin and Bespin, Second Edition, The Illustrated Star Wars Universe, The Queen of Air and Darkness, and Inside the Worlds of Star Wars Trilogy the name is spelled as The Yerith Bespin.
